examples.example: 在爱情中，男女双方都应该为彼此付出，共同经营好这一方天地。

translate.english: In love, both men and women should pay for each other and jointly manage this world well.

examples.example: 每个人都可以在自己擅长的领域里独树一帜，开拓出属于自己的一方天地。

translate.english: Everyone can be unique in their own field of expertise and pioneer a world of their own.

examples.example: 在这小小的一方舞台上，演员们尽情展现着自己的才华。

translate.english: On this small stage, the actors are showing their talents to the fullest.
